overview: Bad Boys Club 2 is comprised of four separate, sizzling sessions of sex. The first is called "Marty Redux" and features Jason Harley and Cade Devlin. The two dudes are hanging out looking for something to do. Harley decides to take a shower. Devlin informs us that he hasn't viewed Harley naked since high school so he decides to take a peek. It doesn’t take long for Devlin to join him, fully dressed, in the shower. He drops to his knees and hums on Harley’s hose.
title: Bad Boys Club 2
